featured.text: Specifically, you will learn to prepare __(23)__ delicious items as roasted chicken, chili, turkey loaf, turkey loaf, meatballs, pasta, among others.

definition.zh_def: 經過烘烤或烤製的，通常指食物，特別是肉類或咖啡豆。
definition.en_def: Cooked by prolonged exposure to heat, typically in an oven or over an open flame.
definition.example: The roasted chicken was crispy on the outside and juicy on the inside.
